attributes.action: create a limited junction J2b on the M4 between J2 and J3 just west of London 2-lane elevated section
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A limited junction (M4J2b) between the M4 and the B454 to allow exit from M4 east (towards London) just before start of 2-lane elevated section, and to allow entrance to M4 west (away from London) just after end of 2-lane elevated section. This makes better use of the existing roads, allowing shorter, more efficient routes to be used.
